course_title: Freshman Seminar:Biology: The Science of Learning
seats: Seats: Maximum Enrollment: 18 / Seats Avail: 0Waitlist Total: 0
class_notes: How do you learn?  Turns out that we often have misconceptions, outdated ideas, and bad habits (#cram, #all-nighter) that cause us to waste time, limit learning, and hurt performance (i.e., grades).  Learning in the sciences is especially challenging; yet, we can use pedagogy science (a.k.a. education research) to guide our studying.  College is about exploration, growth, and fun.  Don't study harder (though you should study hard); study smarter!
